summary: Defines a custom Kolors diffusion pipeline that converts textual prompts and optional source images into generated images, coordinating a frozen ChatGLM text encoder, tokenizer, VAE, conditional UNet, and scheduler, while supporting LoRA weight and IP‑Adapter integration for fine‑tuning and additional conditioning.
business_intent: Showcase how to build and extend a Kolors diffusion pipeline for text‑to‑image and image‑to‑image generation, enabling developers to create customized image generation workflows with advanced conditioning techniques such as LoRA and IP‑Adapter.
